attributes.action: limit all Parliamentary travel expenses to standard class public transport and solely to travel between Parliament and the Constituency of the Parliamentarian
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: M.P.s have spent £4.5 million on travel for "Parliamentary" Duties.  Ordinary People cannot claim expenses, either from the Tax Authorities or from their companies, for travel to or from work.  M.P.s and Lords are in the top ten per cent of earners.  It is iniquitous that those of us who earn far less than parliamentarians should subsidize their travel, when they are so highly paid
